Module cs230
Package cs230.model.entity.enemies

Class SmartThief

java.lang.Object
cs230.model.entity.Entity
cs230.model.entity.Enemy
cs230.model.entity.enemies.SmartThief
public class SmartThief extends Enemy
A thief that works against the player by heading to the nearest loot/lever and collecting it, before leaving through the exit.
Author:
Dafydd-Rhys Maund

    • move

      public void move(Board board)
      Identifies whether there is loot still able to be reached if so, make the best move to reach it if not, check whether the doors are reachable, if so move to them. If neither are doable move randomly.
      Specified by:
      move in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      board - The game board
